channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Forget AI, Microsoft is working on "superintelligence" - with medical diagnosis the first area of interest
item.description: Microsoft’s Humanist Superintelligence seeks to create controllable AI enhancing medicine, education, and sustainability.

item.title: The best early Black Friday deals we’ve found so far on laptops, TVs, and more
item.description: Black Friday is the most anticipated day of the year for bargain hunters. While there’s still some time to go before November 28th, we’re already starting to see a selection of early discounts, allowing you to get a jump on your holiday shopping. Right now, for instance, you can get nearly 50 percent off select […]

item.title: Paramount Plus is getting a price hike in early 2026
item.description: Paramount Plus is going up in price again. As part of its earnings report released on Monday, Paramount announced that it will “implement price increases in the US” in the first quarter of 2026 — without saying how much it will soon cost. Paramount says the price increase will “fuel continued reinvestment in the user […]

item.title: European Countries Probing ‘Security Loophole’ in China-Made Electric Buses
item.description: Norway, Denmark, and the UK are investigating buses from China’s Yutong over fears they could be disabled remotely.

item.title: The Strange Price Some Men Pay After Donating a Kidney? Swollen Balls
item.description: Research finds that many living male kidney donors will need surgery to treat their swollen scrotums.

item.title: ‘V for Vendetta’ Is Becoming a TV Show
item.description: DC Studios will produce a new adaptation of the classic comic for HBO.

item.title: Nintendo’s upcoming Black Friday sale includes up to $30 off Switch classics
item.description: Nintendo rarely offers big discounts on its own games and gear throughout the year, but opportunities to save are coming soon. The company announced that multiple retailers will offer discounts of up to $30 off of beloved Switch games, as well as temporary price cuts on its amiibo figures, and a $20 off discount on […]

item.title: Palm Royale stars call the series ‘Hitchcock meets Bewitched’ ahead of suspenseful season 2 premiere
item.description: Palm Royale cast reveal why the show is like "if Big Little Lies and Bridesmaids had a baby" and what season 2 has in store.

item.title: 50 Black Friday Target deals: Early shoppers save big on TVs, air fryers, streaming sticks, and headphones
item.description: Target's early Black Friday deals and doorbusters include big savings on Bose speakers, Beats headphones, Keurig coffee makers, and TCL TVs.

item.title: How to watch Monday Night Football without starting a new live TV trial: The $5 Sling TV day pass hack
item.description: YouTube TV subscribers looking to watch the Eagles-Packers game can buy a 24-hour pass to ESPN for $4.99 from Sling TV.

item.title: The best doorbell cameras
item.description: With a smart video doorbell, your front door’s communication skills go from 1980s landline to a modern smartphone. Combining a motion-activated camera with a microphone, speaker, and buzzer, a doorbell camera sends alerts to your phone, allowing you to see who’s at the door without needing to open it or even be at home. Whether […]

item.title: Here’s how American Airlines plans to bounce back after the shutdown chaos
item.description: Even with a deal to end the shutdown on the horizon, no one’s breathing easy yet. When the head of schedule planning at American Airlines, Jay Gargas, stepped off the plane in Dallas-Fort Worth after an 18-hour journey from Istanbul last Wednesday, he faced chaos.

item.title: Warren Buffett warns ‘Father Time’ is catching up and reflects on his life in a letter to shareholders
item.description: Buffett also reassured shareholders that he remains confident in his successor, Greg Abel. Billionaire Warren Buffett warned shareholders Monday that many companies will fare better than his Berkshire Hathaway in the decades ahead because of its massive size, though others might say the company’s prospects will dim because “Father Time” is catching up with the 95-year-old icon who plans to step down as CEO in January....

item.title: Meta’s AI Ambitions Appear to Be in a Tailspin
item.description: Turns out investors aren't huge on spending money with no returns.

item.title: ‘Magic: The Gathering’ Ends the Tyrannical Scourge of This Lil’ Guy
item.description: Poor Vivi and his reign in the 'Magic' meta is over.

item.title: Lenovo goes literal with its view of the future of "the cloud" - here's what it thinks future data centers will really look like
item.description: Lenovo proposes extreme data center designs, from floating clouds to underground bunkers.

item.title: A better way of thinking about the AI bubble
item.description: AI isn't all or nothing, and even good bets can turn sour if you aren't careful about how you make them.

item.title: Sports bettors: Think twice about that parlay bet
item.description: Parlay bets are riskier than you may think.

item.title: FDA removes warning label from hormone-based menopause drugs, sidestepping usual process
item.description: The 22-year-old FDA warning advised doctors that hormone therapy increases the risk of blood clots, heart problems, and other health issues. Hormone-based drugs used to treat hot flashes and other menopause symptoms will no longer carry a bold warning label about stroke, heart attack, dementia, and other serious risks, the Food and Drug Administration announced Monday....

item.title: Rad Power Bikes faces shutdown in January without new funding
item.description: Seattle-based Rad Power has gone through multiple rounds of layoffs over the last few years coming out of the pandemic. However, the company is "still fighting to find ways to continue" according to an email viewed by TechCrunch.

item.title: Saudi Arabia’s Dystopian Futuristic City Project Is Crashing and Burning
item.description: Who could have seen this coming?

item.title: Kaltura acquires eSelf, founded by creator of Snap’s AI, in $27M deal
item.description: Kaltura acquires AI avatar startup eSelf to integrate generative AI into enterprise video and learning tools.

item.title: An annual Walmart Plus membership is half off right now
item.description: If you have a mountain of holiday shopping to tackle over the next few weeks, Walmart is offering a great deal on Walmart Plus. New subscribers can snag an annual Walmart Plus membership for half off through December 2nd. The deal knocks the yearly price down to $49 ($49 off), which will automatically renew at […]

item.title: Senate nears vote on government shutdown deal
item.description: An end to the shutdown could still be days away if any senators object and drag out the process. The Senate was drawing closer to a vote on legislation to end the shutdown on Monday after a small group of Senate Democrats broke a 40-day stalemate late Sunday evening and voted with Republicans to move forward with reopening the government.

item.title: What is gait analysis? And can this forensics tool positively identify a suspect?
item.description: A conservative media outlet says it used gait analysis to identify a suspect in the Jan. 6 pipe bombing. Is gait analysis a reliable forensic tool?

item.title: Après Shein, Amazon est épinglé pour la vente de poupées sexuelles enfantines en Suède
item.description: Après Shein, c'est au tour d'Amazon d'avoir un très sérieux problème de pédopornographie. L'organisation suédoise ChildX a déposé plainte contre le géant américain du commerce en ligne en raison de la présence dans ses rayons virtuels de poupées sexuelles à l'apparence d'enfants. Deux autres plateformes d'e-commerce, non citées, sont également ciblées....

item.title: 10+ early Black Friday Walmart deals: Laptops, TVs, Legos already on sale
item.description: Walmart's first Black Friday event starts on Nov. 14, but we found some hidden gem deals already live several days early.

item.title: Hinge users complain it isnt the same app Mamdani met his wife on
item.description: Social media users say that dating apps are not the same since future NYC mayor Zohran Mamdani met his wife Rama Duwaji in 2021.

item.title: The Military’s Plan for Pennywise on ‘It: Welcome to Derry’ Is Completely Unhinged
item.description: We're only three episodes in, but this isn't going to end well for anyone, is it?

item.title: How to watch The Pitt without HBO Max
item.description: Emmy-winning drama "The Pitt" is coming to TNT. Here's how to watch it.
